title: The May the Fox Be With You Edition
description:
Felix Salmon of Fusion, Slate Moneybox columnist Jordan Weissmann, and political risk consultant Anna Szymanski discuss:
Disney acquiring 21st Century Fox
Apple buying Shazam
Bitcoin futures
In Slate Plus: More bitcoin discussion
Check out other Panoply podcasts at megaphone.fm.
Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter:@felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @JHWeissmann
Production by Daniel Schroeder
